description:
Won't leak and easier to pack than a bottle of 2-in-1, these leaves of shampoo help you keep your hair shiny and full. Gentle soap formula works on everything from your hair, to your body, to your clothes.

  • 50 leaves of conditioning shampoo
  • Biodegradable, phosphate and paraben free
  • Light green tea fragrance
  • TSA carry-on compliant
name: Sea To Summit Trek  & Travel Pocket Conditioning Shampoo
